```py
SELECT 
     name, 
     salary
FROM employees
GROUP BY name
HAVING salary > (SELECT AVG(salary) FROM employees);
```

```py
SELECT 
     name 
FROM customers 
WHERE customer_id 
IN 
(
  SELECT customer_id 
  FROM orders 
  WHERE date >= DATEADD(year, -1, GETDATE()) 
  GROUP BY customer_id 
  HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
);
```

```py
SELECT 
    *
FROM table1
INNER JOIN table2
   ON  table1.id = table2.id
   AND table1.name = table2.name;
```
